General.Name: Cypress Development Corp
General.Description: Century Lithium Corp. engages in the acquisition, exploration, evaluation, and development of resource properties in the United States. It primarily explores for lithium. The company holds 100% interests in Clayton Valley project located in southwest Nevada; Dean lithium property in Clayton Valley, Nevada; Glory lithium property in Clayton Valley; and Gunman Project, White Pine Claims, Nevada, as well as interest in Enertopia Project. Century Lithium Corp. was formerly known as Cypress Development Corp. and changed its name to Century Lithium Corp. in January 2023. The company was incorporated in 1991 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 777 Dunsmuir Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V7Y 1K4
